title: Go Hatano
text:
is a <a href="Japanese%20people">Japanese</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Tokyo">FC Tokyo</a>.
Club career.
Hatano joined <a href="FC%20Tokyo">FC Tokyo</a> in 2016. On May 29, he debuted in <a href="J3%20League">J3 League</a> (v <a href="AC%20Nagano%20Parceiro">AC Nagano Parceiro</a>).
National team career.
In May 2017, Hatano was elected <a href="Japan%20national%20under-20%20football%20team">Japan U-20 national team</a> for <a href="2017%20FIFA%20U-20%20World%20Cup">2017 U-20 World Cup</a>. But did not play in the match, as he was the team's reserve goalkeeper.
Club statistics.
"Updated to 19 December 2020".
Reserves performance.
Last Updated: 25 February 2019
Honours.
Club.
FC Tokyo
